title: MNAs felicitate PM on presenting pro-people budget
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 16 (APP):Members of the National Assembly Amir Talal Gopang, Malik Abrar Ahmed, Jamal Shah Kakar and Agha Rafiullah Monday called on Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif and discussed matters relating to mutual issues.
During their separate meetings, the lawmakers felicitated the prime minister on presenting a pro-people budget despite the challenging circumstances.
They also assured the prime minister of their full support in approving the budget from the National Assembly.
They also acknowledged that under his leadership, the countryâ€™s economy is booming and its defense capabilities are also improving.
Minister for Public Affairs Rana Mubasshir Iqbal and Special Assistant to Prime Minister Talha Burki were also present on the occasion.
